signUp.bodyDescription: Sign up, so you can manage the web
signUp.acceptTermsPrivacy: Accept Terms and Privacy
signUp.checkFirstNameChar:
Wrong first name, accepted characters:

a-z
signUp.checkLastNameChar:
Wrong last name, accepted characters:

a-z
signUp.checkNickNameChar:
Wrong nick name, accepted characters:

a-z 0-9 - _
signUp.checkRepeatEmailCompare: Email and repeat email do not match
signUp.checkPasswordChar:
Wrong password, accepted characters:

a-z A-Z 0-9 @ * # _-
signUp.checkPasswordUpperCase: Incorrect password, at least one capital letter
signUp.checkPasswordLowerCase: Incorrect password, at least one lowercase letter
signUp.checkPasswordNumber: Incorrect password, at least one number
signUp.checkPasswordSpecial:
Incorrect password, minimum one special character:

* # @ _-
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordChar:
Repeat wrong password, characters accepted:

a-z A-Z 0-9 @ * # _-
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordUpperCase: Repeat wrong password, at least one capital letter
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordLowerCase: Repeat wrong password, at least one lowercase letter
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordNumber: Repeat wrong password, minimum one number
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordSpecial:
Repeat wrong password, minimum one special character:

* # @ _-
signUp.checkRepeatPasswordCompare: Password and repeat password do not match
signUp.log: Account admin created correctly from the panel
signUp.mailContent:
Hello %s, the account was created successfully.

It is necessary to activate.

Security code:

%s

Copy and paste code in form activation of the account.

Creation date: %s

If you did not create this account, ignore this message, your email will be removed from our website in the next 48 hours, a thousand apologies.
signUp.success:
Account created successfully, it is necessary to activate
redirecting in:
